participant_1.background:
I could not be a member of a band if I were blind because I would not be able to read the music or play my instrument.
i hate cleaning.
I am short, but I am still able to do my work on the farm.
Social media is not my thing.
i wonder what it would be like to be a different gender.

participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
I spend time with my mom and my dog and enjoy a little gossip.
I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives.
i like fitness.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.

content.text: Doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well too! I'm excited to be talking to you today.
Me too! I'm always looking for new people to connect with.
I'm glad to hear that. So, what do you do for fun?
I love to create jewelry. I find it's a great way to express my creativity.
That's really cool! I've never tried jewelry design before.
You should give it a try! It's really fun and you can make some really beautiful pieces.
Maybe I will! I'm always looking for new hobbies to try.
That's great! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
You're welcome! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my mom and my dog. We go for walks in the park, and we love to play fetch.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love dogs. They're such great companions.
They are! I'm so glad I have my dog in my life.
I'm sure he's glad to have you in his life too.
I think so! He always seems so happy to see me.
That's so sweet. I love dogs.
